request.description:
# Get Users

This endpoint is used to retrieve a list of users.

## Request

- Method: GET
    
- URL: {{BaseURL}}/usuarios
    

## Response

The response will contain a list of user objects, including their details such as user ID, name, email, and other relevant information.

Example response:

``` json
[
    {
        "id": 123,
        "name": "John Doe",
        "email": "johndoe@example.com",
        ...
    },
    {
        "id": 456,
        "name": "Jane Smith",
        "email": "janesmith@example.com",
        ...
    },
    ...
]

 ```
